snippet: Critics say that the change, which would apply to dual citizens and is backed by a Socialist government tiptoeing to the right, would be un-French.
abstract: France proposes to strip citizenship from French-born dual nationals convicted of terrorism, setting off furious debate.

byline.contributor: Adam Liptak contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Critics say that the change, which would apply to dual citizens and is backed by a Socialist government tiptoeing to the right, would be un-French.

headline.main: French Proposal to Strip Citizenship Over Terrorism Sets Off Alarms
headline.print_headline: French Proposal to Strip Citizenship From Terrorists Sets Off Alarms
